articles.title: Congratulations from Russian President
articles.content:
Congratulations from Russian President
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Wednesday received a congratulatory message from Dmitri Medvedev, president of Russia, on his birthday.
					 The message said:
					
					 Respected Your Excellency Kim Jong Il,
					
					 I congratulate you on your birthday.
					
					 I believe that you would make contribution to strengthening and developing the traditional Russia-DPRK good-neighborly relations at the responsible post of chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission in the future, too.
					
					 I wish you good health and success in your important and responsible work.

articles.title: Congratulations from Syrian President
articles.content:
Congratulations from Syrian President
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory message from Bashar al-Assad, president of Syrian Arab Republic, Sunday on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The message said:
					
					 Please accept my best wishes to you.
					
					 It is my pleasure to extend the warmest congratulations to you and the people of DPRK on the occasion of your birthday. I wish you good health and happiness and the friendly Korean people greater progress and prosperity. 
					
					 Highest regards.

articles.title: Felicitation from Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Felicitation from Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Wednesday received a congratulatory message from Raul Castro Ruz, second secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, on his birthday.
					 The message wished Kim Jong Il good health and success in his work of leading the fraternal Korean people.

articles.title: Foreign Diplomats Visit Venue of Kimjongilia Festival
articles.content:
oreign Diplomats Visit Venue of Kimjongilia Festival 
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here visited the venue of the Kimjongilia festival on Wednesday, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 They were fascinated by immortal flowers in full bloom. 
					
					 After going round the venue, they made entries in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Visits Venue of Kimjongilia Festival
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Visits Venue of Kimjongilia Festival
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Secretariat of the Japanese Society for the Study of Kimilsungism visited the venue of the 15th Kimjongilia Festival Wednesday, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The delegation headed by its Secretary General Masaharu Ueki is on a visit to the DPRK.
					
					 The visitors were deeply moved and fascinated by beautiful Kimjongilias in full bloom.
					
					 At the end of the visit the head of the delegation made an entry in the visitor's book.
					
					 He wrote: I warmly congratulate General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his birthday. My visit to the festival provided an opportunity to know better about the Korean people's reverence for him and the reality of the DPRK in which the leader and the people form a harmonious whole.

articles.title: Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan Perform for Guests of Honor
articles.content:
Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan Perform for Guests of Honor
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The art troupe of Koreans in Japan gave a music and dance performance "Charm and Respect" at the Pyongyang Grand Theater on Wednesday to celebrate February 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					 The audience included Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Yong Chun, minister of the People's Armed Forces, Kim Yang Gon, Choe Ryong Hae and Mun Kyong Dok, secretaries of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, and others. 
					
					 A congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan and other Koreans in Japan appreciated the performance. 
					
					 The colorful performance included numbers like "Charm and Respect", "Fortune of Korea" and "Yangsando" prepared with sincerity in profound reverence for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Numbers "It Is an Offensive Action", "Toward Bright Future of Chongryon", "Arirang of Prosperity" and "Arirang for Prosperity of Chongryon" were also put on the stage.

articles.title: Reception Given for Overseas Compatriots
articles.content:
Reception Given for Overseas Compatriots
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A reception was given for the overseas compatriots at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were the congratulatory groups of overseas Koreans and compatriots staying in the socialist homeland.
					
					 Kim Yang Gon, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kang Ji Yong, director of the Bureau of Service for Overseas Compatriots, and other officials were on hand.
					
					 The secretary, in his speech, warmly welcomed all the overseas compatriots who came to the DPRK to celebrate the February holiday with the people in the homeland.
					
					 He said that thanks to the patriotic devotion of Kim Jong Il, world-startling events and miracles are being made everywhere in the DPRK.
					
					 He called on the overseas compatriots to remain true to the leadership of Kim Jong Il and leave traces of worthwhile lives in the sacred road of building a thriving socialist nation and achieving national reunification.
					
					 Head of the congratulatory group of the Koreans in Japan Pae Jin Gu, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean residents in Japan, extended the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Il, reflecting the profound loyalty of all the overseas Koreans.
					
					 The sacred life of Kim Jong Il is the one of devotion and labor for the eternal prosperity and happiness of the country and the nation and the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful nation, he said.
					
					 He called upon the overseas compatriots to keep pace with the forced march of Kim Jong Il and make a positive contribution to hastening the day of building a thriving nation and thus fulfill their duties and obligations.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Placed before Statue of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Placed before Statue of Kim Il Sung
						
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Overseas compatriots placed floral baskets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill on Feb. 16.
					 They included a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan, a congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China, a congratulatory group of the International United Confederation of Koreans, a congratulatory group of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S., a congratulatory group of the Federation of Koreans in Canada and a congratulatory group of the Federation of Koreans in Australia. 
					
					 They laid down floral baskets and flowers before the statue in profound reverence for him before making bows.

articles.title: Music and Dance Performance Given
articles.content:
Music and Dance Performance Given
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The Mansudae Art Troupe gave a music and dance performance at the East Pyongyang Grand Theater on Wednesday to celebrate the birthday of leader           Kim Jong Il. 
					 The audience included senior party, state and army officials, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, ministries and national institutions, labor innovators and Pyongyangites. 
					
					 Congratulatory groups, overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front also appreciated the performance. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys of various countries, representatives of international organizations and members of the military attaches corps here and foreign guests. 
					
					 The performance included numbers like "Cantata to Comrade             Kim Jong Il", "Greeting Spring of Jong Il Peak" and "Frost Flowers in February."
					
					 The performers presented the greatest glory to Kim Jong Il who is demonstrating the dignity and might of Kim Il Sung's Korea all over the world.
					
					 A similar performance was given by the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League at the Central Youth Hall the same day.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students were held in different parts of the DPRK on Wednesday, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The plazas in Pyongyang including those of the Party Founding Memorial Tower, the April 25 House of Culture and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium were full of pleasure and joy of the youth and students greeting the February holiday.
					
					 The parties started with "Fortune of Korea". The dancers presented the beautiful dances with their great honor and happiness of being led by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They enthusiastically danced to the tune of "His Ideal", "Let's Sing of Our Pride in Being under the Guidance of the General", "Our Country Making Changes", etc.
					
					 On the same day similar dancing parties took place in provincial seats, cities and counties. They include Phyongsong in South Phyongan Province, Wonsan in Kangwon Province and Kanggye in Jagang Province.

articles.title: Meeting of Korean Children's Union Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Korean Children's Union Held
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The meeting of the Joint National Organization of the Korean Children's Union was held at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Wednesday, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Attending the meeting were provincial representatives of the Korean Children's Union and members of the Union in Pyongyang.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Choe Ryong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok and other officials concerned and officials of the Party and the youth league, war veterans and men of merits in Pyongyang.
					
					 Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, said in his report that Kim Jong Il was born as the son of guerillas embodying the spirit of Mt. Paektu. Thanks to this historic February day the Korean people could advance along the road of victory and glory blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation, he added.
					
					 He called on all the members of the Korean Children's Union to study hard learning from the glorious childhood of the leader and join the activities of the Union with sincerity and thus grow to be genuine sons and daughters of Songun Korea.
					
					 The report was followed by the admission ceremony of the Children's Union.
					
					 Led by Choe Ryong Hae the pupils made admission vows before the flag of the Korean Children's Union.
					
					 Officials, war veterans and men of merits tied the red ties around their necks and hung Union badges on their chests.
					
					 Republic Hero Ri Ki Hwan who is a war veteran, Pak Ji Min, professor and doctor of Kim Chaek University of Technology, and Labor Hero and People's Sportswoman Kim Song Hui made congratulatory speeches.

articles.title: Children's Camping Starts for This Year
articles.content:
Children's Camping Starts for This Year
						
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Schoolchildren's camping for this year started at the Jangjasan Children's Camp, Jagang Province, on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Campers came from various parts of the country including Pyongyang, South Phyongan Province and Ryanggang Province. A ceremony of receiving them took place on Feb. 16.
					
					 A report and speeches were made there. 
					
					 Welcoming the campers were Ju Yong Sik, chief secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Choe Ki Ryong, chairman of the Jagang Provincial People's Committee, and officials concerned.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- People from all walks of life and school youth and children significantly celebrated the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 An endless stream of officials, working people and school youth and children visited the venue of the 15th Kimjongilia Festival in Pyongyang and the Kimjongilia exhibition halls in provinces.
					
					 Performances were given at theaters and halls in Pyongyang, Kanggye, Hamhung, Chongjin and Wonsan cities, Taehongdan, Phyongwon and Kangryong counties and other areas before capacity audience.
					
					 Workers of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex significantly spent the holiday enjoying art performance, while producing much more iron and steel. 
					
					 Sports and amusement games including volleyball, Korean chess and Yut-games were held in units including the February 8 Vinalon Complex, the Musan Mining Complex, the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex, the Anju Area Coal Complex, the Sinuiju Cosmetics Factory and the Hyesan Youth Mine.

articles.title: Congratulations from AINDF
articles.content:
Congratulations from AINDF
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory letter from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on Wednesday, his birthday.
					 The message said:
					
					 Your birth on February 16, Juche 31 (1942) as a bright star over Mt. Paektu was a great fortune for the Korean nation as it promised a bright future of Juche Korea and a great event of world historic significance that guaranteed the bright future of the human cause of independence.
					
					 Thanks to your birthday the Korean nation could be blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation and victoriously advance the revolutionary cause of Juche, bravely weathering all sorts of ordeals and difficulties of history. Thanks to this day Songun Korea could demonstrate its might as an invincible power steering the era of independence century after century. 
					
					 Your revolutionary history is the history of succession as you have carried forward the cause of the sun with your outstanding ideas, distinguished leadership art and noble virtues. It also represents the glorious chronicle in which you ushered in a great heyday of Songun Korea with dynamic practice for changes.
					
					 It is the greatest fortune and the highest honor for us fellow countrymen to hold you in high esteem as you are leading the Korean nation and the times to independence and progress with your invincible political caliber and outstanding Songun politics.
					
					 The letter renewed AINDF's resolution to glorify this year, a year before the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, the great event to be specially recorded in the history of the Korean nation, as a landmark year for opening a new phase in the movement for national reunification without fail.

articles.title: Congratulations from Chongryon
articles.content:
Congratulations from Chongryon
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory message Wednesday from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on the occasion of his birthday.
					 You are a genius of idea and theory and invincible commander of Songun as you have performed undying feats for the country and the people, the era and history by devoting your all to the sacred struggle for the victory of the Juche cause and the human cause of independence for decades since you embarked upon the road of revolution in your early years, and a distinguished elder statesman recognized by the world, the message said.
					
					 You firmly defended socialism of Juche under the uplifted banner of Songun during the period of ordeals when the destiny of the country and the nation was at the crossroads and aroused all the people across the country to a great drive for building a thriving nation, it noted, adding: Your feats serve as the treasure which will always go down in the history of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 You are the peerless patriot and peerlessly great man who is glorifying the new era of prosperity in which all the ideals of the people are being translated into reality after putting the dignity of the country and the national power on the highest level, the hundred-year history of the new victory of Kim Il Sung's Korea, it said.
					
					 It noted that the Koreans in Japan will do a tangible work conducive to improving the people's standard of living, increasing the agricultural production and developing science and technology in the homeland, reject the south Korean anti-reunification forces' moves to escalate confrontation with compatriots and ignite a new war and join in the nationwide struggle to open an epochal phase of peace on the Korean Peninsula and its reunification.
					
					 And they will conduct external activities to get the Japanese authorities make a switchover in its DPRK policy going against the trend of the times and implement the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration and deepen friendship and ties with the Japanese people, it stressed.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter from Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter from Overseas Koreans
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory letter from the members of the congratulatory groups, delegations and visiting groups of overseas Koreans staying in the homeland on Wednesday, his birthday.
					The birth of you as a bright star of Mt. Paektu was a great fortune of the Korean nation which promised the eternal prosperity of Kim Il Sung's Korea and a worldwide event which guaranteed the bright future of the human cause of independence, the letter said, and went on:
					
					You established the original Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism and have met every blatant challenge of the imperialist allied forces with the matchless arms of Mt. Paektu to ensure steady victories, thus firmly defending the sovereignty of the nation.
					
					You have provided field guidance day and night through your high intensify forced march. It is thanks to your dedicated leadership that the world-startling successes were made one after another and there took place remarkable events in which the centuries-old ideals of the people are being translated into reality in all parts of the country.
					
					Under the banner of the Three Charters for National Reunification, you illuminated the way of independent reunification, peace and prosperity and are opening an epochal phase of the reunification, dealing a resolute and merciless sledge-hammer blows at the frantic anti-DPRK, anti-reunification moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean group of conservatives.
					
					We will enshrine the immutable faith that the thriving nation and the country's reunification would surely come as long as we are led by you, the letter said. It vowed the pledge to trust and follow Kim Jong Il and remain true to him to the last.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Editorially Celebrates Kim Jong Il's Birthday
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Editorially Celebrates Kim Jong Il's Birthday
						
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Victory is always in store for the DPRK as it has General Secretary Kim Jong Il at the head of the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolution, there are the invincible single-minded unity of all service persons and people around him, the matchless revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu and the socialist system of Juche. Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in an editorial dedicated to his birthday.
					 Kim Jong Il is a peerlessly patriot who makes Korea shed eternal rays as an invincible socialist power, a creator of happiness who translates into reality all the ideals of the Korean people with his tireless efforts and devotion and a benevolent teacher and father of people as he takes care of and leads all soldiers and people with his warm comradely love and trust, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 Thanks to his immortal Songun revolutionary leadership exploits the DPRK is demonstrating its dignity as a politico-ideological power, the strongest power of independence with matchless armed forces and unbreakable single-minded unity.
					
					 The WPK has developed into a mother party which leads the people with full responsibility for their destiny, regarding their mindset as a foundation of the single-minded unity. This is the shining fruition of his policy of attaching importance to the people.
					
					 He made endless forced march for field guidance day and night despite rain or snow to bring about a chain of landmark events unprecedented in the nation's history and materialize the people's centuries-old ideals and wishes.
					
					 The single-minded unity of the DPRK is growing stronger than ever before, inspired by the endless long journeys for loving care made by Kim Jong Il, saying there are soldiers on his left side, people on his right side and officials among them.
					
					 The drive for a revolutionary surge now raging across the country means a torchlight kindled by him out of his love and trust in the soldiers and people and an expression of their indomitable mental power to live up to his trust.
					
					 The WPK's cause of building a thriving nation is sure to triumph as its leader's ideology and guidance are great and it has the single-minded unity of the Songun revolutionary ranks following him with the firm belief in him only.

articles.title: Reception Given by Chongryon
articles.content:
Reception Given by Chongryon
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), gave a reception at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Feb. 14 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were Chief Vice-Chairman Ho Jong Man, vice-chairmen and advisors of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, the permanent advisor of the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, the directors of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, leading officials of organizations and enterprises, chairmen of headquarters of Chongryon in the Kanto area and Korean workers in commerce.
					
					 Present there on invitation were personages of different circles of Japan and diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations in Tokyo.
					
					 Ho Jong Man in his speech said that the historic Conference of the Workers' Party of Korea and the celebrations of the 65th anniversary of the foundation of the WPK were held in the homeland last year. This powerfully demonstrated the steadfast will of the Korean people to build a thriving nation without fail, true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung, rallied close around the C.C., the WPK headed by Kim Jong Il, he noted.
					
					 It is the requirement of the international community and the trend of the times to ensure the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula through dialogue and negotiations, he said. He urged the U.S. and the south Korean authorities not to go against this trend of history.
					
					 Whether the DPRK-Japan dialogue is realized or not entirely depends on the attitude of the Japanese government, he added.
					
					 He called for defending the rights of Koreans in Japan and striving for improved bilateral relations.

articles.title: Seminar by Korean Social Scientists in Japan
articles.content:
Seminar by Korean Social Scientists in Japan
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A seminar of Korean social scientists in Japan was held in Tokyo on Feb. 12 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were Ko Tok U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), and other officials of Chongryon, Korean social scientists and compatriots.
					
					 The theme of the seminar was "The settlement of historic task of Koreans in Japan and movement for gaining their position".
					
					 Kim Hwa Hyo, chairman of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, made a report at the seminar. Then followed speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers praised Kim Jong Il for leading the cause of building a thriving nation to victory through his high intensity forced march.
					
					 The ideas of Kim Jong Il on the movement of the Koreans in Japan and the work of Chongryon serve as the guidelines for solving the basic issues of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and organizing the struggle for defending their rights, they noted.
					
					 They said that the democratic national rights of Koreans in Japan are being gravely threatened owing to the Japanese authorities' hostile policy toward the DPRK and their discrimination and suppression of Koreans in Japan based on it.
					
					 They stressed the need for Chongryon to fully tap all its forces to tide over the present situation.

articles.title: Seminar Held in Different Countries
articles.content:
Seminar Held in Different Countries
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held in Ukraine, Thailand and Bangladesh on Feb. 3 and 9 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed were photos on his feats and wise leadership and those introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has applied the Juche idea in all party building and activities, regarding it as the guiding idea of the Workers' Party of Korea, said Nikolai Polishk, chairman of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					
					 He explained that Kim Jong Il proved the validity and originality of the Juche idea and developed it in depth as required by the times with his energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 The chairman of the "Sun of Juche" Association of Journalists and Men of Culture for the Study of Kimjongilism of Ukraine said that the Juche idea comprehensively indicates the theoretical and practical issues arising in realizing the independence of the popular masses against all manners of domination and subjugation. The tasks and ways for their settlement are also expounded in the idea, he added.
					
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, and other speakers said that the army and people of the DPRK are making a signal leap forward in building a thriving nation under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 M. Jahangir Khan, advisor to the Bangladesh Barisal Society for the Study of Songun Policy, and other speakers expressed belief that the Korean people would surely build a thriving nation and achieve the reunification of the country as they are led by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Organizations in Ecuador and Bangladesh issued bulletins on Feb. 9 to mark the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The Ecuador-Guaranda Institute for Friendship and Cultural Solidarity with the Korean People said that President Kim Il Sung is immortal as the eternal president of the DPRK thanks to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The bulletin said that Kim Jong Il is the great leader in the present era recognized by not only the Korean people but also the people in Asia, Africa and Latin America. The might of the DPRK is precisely the leadership ability of Kim Jong Il, it added.
					
					 The Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee in an article praised the noble personality of Kim Jong Il who believes in people as in Heaven, admiring them as his teacher while considering himself as the son and faithful servant of the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Different Countries
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Meetings, photo exhibitions and film shows took place in different countries on Feb. 7 and 9 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 They are Laos, Mongolia, Bangladesh, Pakistan and India.
					
					 Displayed at the venues were photos on his feats and those introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Films shown included "Pyongyang at Night" and "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation".
					
					 The secretary of the C.C., the Lao People's Revolutionary Youth Union said that the DPRK is registering great successes in building a thriving nation under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Il and the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries are growing stronger day by day.
					
					 The president of the Bangladesh People's League said that Kim Jong Il has turned the DPRK into a military power capable of beating back any aggression forces with his original Songun revolutionary leadership. Kim Jong Il is the great leader of the progressive mankind who is steering the cause of independence against imperialism straight to a victory, he added.
					
					 The chairman of the National Workers' Party of Pakistan noted that the reality of the DPRK clearly proves that Kim Jong Il is a distinguished statesman who is leading the socialist cause to victory with the might of ideology.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings in Mongolia and Pakistan.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Central African President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Central African President
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Francois Bozize upon his reelection as President of the Central African Republic.
					The message expressed belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to grow stronger in the future, too. It sincerely wished the President happiness in good health and bigger success in his work for the stability and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with the art troupe of Koreans in Japan at the Pyongyang Grand Theater on Wednesday. The troupe led by Ri Ryong Su, head of the Kumgang-san Opera Troupe of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), is on a visit to the DPRK to celebrate February 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there was Pae Jin Gu, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon and head of the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Chinese Minister of Public Security on Sino-DPRK Friendship
articles.content:
Chinese Minister of Public Security on Sino-DPRK Friendship
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations are steadily growing stronger, said Meng Jianzhu, state councilor of the People's Republic of China and minister of Public Security, who visited the DPRK.
					 I was glad to visit the friendly DPRK in the significant year marking the 50th anniversary of the signing of the China-DPRK Treaty of Friendship, Cooperation and Mutual Assistance, he noted, adding:
					
					 The Sino-DPRK friendship is a treasure provided and brought into bloom by the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries.
					
					 The bilateral relations are steadily developing as the days go by under the deep care of General Secretary Hu Jintao and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il visited China twice last year and had in-depth exchanges of views on the issues of mutual concern with Hu Jintao.
					
					 His China visits helped develop the bilateral friendship to a new higher stage.
					
					 It is the fixed policy of the Chinese party and government to boost the Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations.
					
					 These relations sealed in blood are brotherly and comradely.
					
					 The traditional Sino-DPRK friendship will be evergreen.
					
					 He wished the Korean people greater progress under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Documentary Film Produced
articles.content:
Documentary Film Produced
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- "Great Comradeship of Illustrious Commander of Songun", part 7 of documentary film "Sun of Songun Shining All over the World" was produced in the DPRK.
					The film deals with the feats General Secretary Kim Jong Il performed by developing the revolutionary armed forces with his loving care and trust, firmly determined to accomplish with comradeship the revolutionary cause of Juche started with comradeship.
					
					 It also tells that he gave an eternal life to the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters and the soldiers who remained faithful to the Songun leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea in every chronicle of the revolution, always showing loving care for them.
					
					 The film shows that he took deep care of the service personnel's life with fatherly loving care and visited soldiers crossing steep mountain ranges and braving the rough sea. It also deals with other historic stories about his noble comradeship.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Prize Awarded to CNC Instrument Automatic Streamline
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Prize Awarded to CNC Instrument Automatic Streamline
						
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Il Sung Prize was awarded to the CNC instrument automatic streamline, according to a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly issued Wednesday.
					 The streamline was newly developed by workers of the Unsan Instrument Factory and technicians of the Ryonha Machine Management Bureau.

articles.title: Folk Games for January 15th of Lunar Calendar
articles.content:
Folk Games for January 15th of Lunar Calendar
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The Koreans have celebrated the January 15th of the lunar calendar as a folk holiday since olden times. This holiday is marked on the occasion of the appearance of a full moon. 
					They have played different folk games on the day.
					
					One of them is setting up poles with grain stalks with the advent of the January fourteenth of the lunar calendar. This game was played mainly by children.
					
					They set up poles holding rice, kaoliang, foxtail, millet and other grain stalks before singing songs and dancing around them. 
					
					This custom reflects the hope of peasants to see the same bumper harvest in the new year, too, as those big ears of rice and other grains hanging from the poles.
					
					On the day of the full moon people enjoyed a game with torches, greeting the moon.
					
					Koreans used to climb mountains and hills around their villages to enjoy the full moon on the evening of the 15th and go out to fields with torches to burn weeds and insects. 
					
					Children enjoyed kite-flying, toy pinwheel, tug of war and other folk games on this holiday.

articles.title: Unjong Tea Garden
articles.content:
Unjong Tea Garden
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The Kangryong Unjong Tea Garden in South Hwanghae Province in the DPRK turned into a socialist land of bliss.
					 Situated in the Tungam area, the garden lies along the west coast by modern production premises, public buildings and housing estate.
					
					 The employees completed a pig farm and an organic fertilizer plant for ring-shape circular production system. They also paved roads, dug drainage canals and improved rivers.
					
					 More than 10 blocks of public buildings including cultural center, housing units, nursery, kindergarten and school were built in the provincial seat.

articles.title: Many Units, Organizations and Monuments Abroad Named after Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Many Units, Organizations and Monuments Abroad Named after Kim Jong Il 
						
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) --There came into being Kim Jong Il Class at Ali Ali School in Karachi, Pakistan, in Feb. Juche 78 (1989).
					 There is a touching story about the appearance of the class.
					
					 Saida, then principal of the school, came to express profound reverence for Kim Jong Il while visiting the DPRK several times. He was deeply impressed to learn about the popular education system whereby everyone was given full opportunity of learning free of charge. 
					
					 Feeling the strong urge to widely introduce his greatness, he took the initiative to organize Kim Jong Il Class at the school. 
					
					 His initiative was supported by all the teachers of the school. 
					
					 "Our school is highly proud of having a class named after HE Kim Jong Il, the leader of the world stature produced by Korea. It is our greatest honor and happiness to have the class named after the great man", he said.
					
					 The august name of the peerlessly great man is still shedding its rays all over the world as a symbol of the popular masses in the era of independence and a beacon of hope.
					
					 The number of units, organizations and objects named after Kim Jong Il is on the steady increase. They include monuments "Protectors of Arts for the Century" named after President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing in various cities of Russia and the "Long live General Kim Jong Il" Fellowship Society in Benin.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito 
  Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ATCC) --  El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio la funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito.
					  El Dirigente respondio cordialmente a las aclamaciones entusiastas de los espectadores y les felicito calidamente por sus esfuerzos abnegados por defender la patria y lograr la prosperidad de la patria socialista apoyando la direccion del partido sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun. 
					
					  Los ejecutantes pusieron en la escena diversas piezas tales como el quinteto femenino y coro masculino "Gloria a nuestro gran partido", el coro masculino "Casa natal cubierta de nieve" y el solo y coro masculinos "Que conquisten la cumbre de la tecnologia de punta".
					
					  A traves de esta funcion marcada por el impetu combativo, los ejecutantes mostraron bien las imborrables proezas de guia del Dirigente y la ferrea conviccion y voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos de llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche siguiendo con fidelidad a el. 
					
					  Terminada la funcion, el Dirigente felicito el exito de la funcion respondiendo con su mano alzada a la aclamacion de ejecutantes y espectadores. 
					
					  Muy satisfecho de que los artistas del Coro Estatal Benemerito hayan ofrecido esta funcion magnifica en que se palpitan la conviccion y la voluntad de Corea y el espiritu revolucionario de los militares, les expreso agradecimiento. 
					
					  Manifesto la esperanza y conviccion de que ellos desplegaran con dinamismo las actividades artisticas revolucionarias para llamar con mas energia a los militares y habitantes a la marcha general revolucionaria del Songun. 
					
					  Le acompanaron en esta ocasion los cuadros del partido, el Estado y el ejercito. Kim Jong Un, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Kyong Hui, Kang Sok Ju, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang, U Tong Chuk y Kim Chang Sop, los miembros de la Comision Militar Central del PTC Kim Kyong Ok, Kim Won Hong, Kim Myong Guk, Jong Myong Do, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Yong Chol y Yun Jong Rin, y los jefes de departamento del CDN Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente ruso
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente ruso
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 16 el Presidente ruso Dmitri Anatolievich Medvedev con motivo de su cumpleanos.
					  El mensaje sigue:
					
					  Estimado Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il
					
					  Aprovecho esta ocasion para enviarle a Usted mis calidas felicitaciones por el dia de su natalicio.
					
					  Estoy seguro de que Usted seguira contribuyendo al desarrollo de las tradicionales relaciones de buena vecindad Rusia-Corea ocupado el cargo de Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC.
					
					  Formulo votos por su buena salud y exitos en su importante y responsable trabajo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente sirio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente sirio
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio el mensaje de felicitacion que en ocasion de su cumpleanos le dirigiera el dia 13 el Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al-Assad.
					  El mensaje senala como sigue:
					
					  Reciba Vd. mis sinceros votos.
					
					  Tengo el gran placer de felicitar calidamente a Su Excelencia y al pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea con motivo del dia de su nacimiento y deseo que Vd. tenga buena salud y felicidad y el amistoso pueblo coreano logre el mayor progreso y prosperidad.
					
					  Expreso el testimonio de mi mas alta consideracion.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio el mensaje de felicitacion que con motivo de su cumpleanos le enviara el dia 16 Raul Castro Ruz, Segundo Secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba.
					La misiva sigue abajo:
					
					En ocasion de su 69 cumpleanos, lo felicito cordialmente y le deseo salud y exitos en su trabajo al frente del hermano pueblo coreano.

articles.title: Acto nacional de organizaciones de la Union de Ninos de Corea
articles.content:
Acto nacional de organizaciones de la Union de Ninos de Corea
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 16 en el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang el acto nacional de las organizaciones de la Union de Ninos de Corea (UNC) con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					Participaron en la ocasion los representantes de la UNC de todas las provincias y los miembros de la misma entidad en esta capital.
					
					Fueron invitados Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Choe Ryong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok y otros cuadros, los funcionarios del partido y de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, los veteranos de guerra y los hombres benemeritos de esta capital.
					
					El primer secretario del CC de la Union de la Juventud, Ri Yong Chol, dijo en el informe que gracias a aquel febrero historico en que el Dirigente nacio como hijo de la guerrilla con la savia del monte Paektu, el pueblo coreano pudo avanzar por el unico camino de la victoria y la gloria gozando de generacion en generacion la fortuna de contar con excelentes lideres y generales.
					
					Todos los miembros de la UNC deben formarse como verdaderos hijos de la Corea del Songun aprendiendo con asiduo la gloriosa historia del Dirigente en su juventud e infancia y participando bien en la vida organizativa de la UNC, apunto.
					
					En el conclave se efectuo la ceremonia de admision de nuevos miembros.
					
					Los alumnos aspirantes tomaron juramento ante la bandera de la UNC repitiendo lo que les dictaba Choe Ryong Hae.
					
					Los funcionarios, veteranos de guerra y hombres benemeritos pusieron a los nuevos integrantes las panoletas rojas e insignias de la UNC.
					
					Acto seguido, hicieron uso de la palabra de felicitacion el Heroe de la Republica Ri Ki Hwan quien es veterano de guerra, el profesor titular y doctor de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, Pak Ji Min, y la Heroina del Trabajo y deportista del Pueblo, Kim Song Hui.

articles.title: Filmada pelicula "Gran camaraderia del General Insigne del Songun"
articles.content:
Filmada pelicula "Gran camaraderia del General Insigne del Songun" 
  Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ATCC) -- Se ha filmado en Corea el documental "Gran camaraderia del General Insigne del Songun", septima parte de "El Sol del Songun que brilla en todo el mundo".
					  El filme enumera las hazanas del Dirigente realizadas para el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias partiendo de su ferrea voluntad de llevar a feliz termino con la camaraderia la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada con la misma.
					
					   Relata que el Dirigente adora y eterniza la vida de los ex combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses y de los que en cada decada de la revolucion apoyaron con fidelidad la direccion del Songun del partido. 
					
					  Recoge los episodios historicos de la noble camaraderia del Dirigente quien atiende con amor paternal las condiciones de vida de los militares del ejercito popular y no vacila en cruzar montanas accidentadas e ir contra vientos y mareas para visitar las unidades militares.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun publica editorial dedicado al 16 de febrero
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun publica editorial dedicado al 16 de febrero
  Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun publico en su edicion de este miercoles un editorial dedicado al dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					  La victoria es siempre nuestra porque al frente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y la revolucion esta el Dirigente y tenemos la invencible unidad monolitica de todos los militares y civiles en torno a el, el poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu y el regimen socialista del Juche, comienza el editorial y prosigue: 
					
					  El Dirigente es patriota sin igual, creador de felicidad y padre generoso y maestro del pueblo quien glorifica a Corea como inexpugnable potencia socialista, realiza con su incansable y abnegada direccion todos los ideales del pueblo coreano y conduce a todos los militares y civiles con el amor y confianza en los camaradas. 
					
					  Gracias a las imborrables proezas revolucionarias del Songun del Dirigente, nuestro pais es dignificado como potencia ideo-politica e independiente que tiene invencibles fuerzas armadas e inquebrantable unidad monolitica. 
					
					  El PTC considera la voz del pueblo como fundamento de la unidad monolitica y se ha fortalecido como partido madre que se responsabiliza totalmente del destino del pueblo. Esto es el brillante fruto de la politica del Dirigente de dar importancia al pueblo. 
					
					  En el trayecto de marcha forzada que emprende de dia a noche el Dirigente para realizar la direccion en el terreno, acontecen sucesivamente los eventos relevantes nunca vistos en la historia nacional y se realizan uno por uno los ideales seculares de nuestro pueblo. 
					
					  El gran auge revolucionario que se da en todo el pais es producto de amor y confianza del Dirigente en el ejercito y el pueblo y la explosion de la inagotable fuerza espiritual de estos para recompensarlos. 
					
					  Es definitiva la victoria de la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera del PTC porque son grandiosas la idea y la direccion del Dirigente y es solida la unidad monolitica de las filas revolucionarias del Songun que confian y siguen con fidelidad a el.
